effect_entries.effect: Fails if not used on a sleeping Pokémon.  Inflicts regular damage.  Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.
effect_entries.short_effect: Only works on sleeping Pokémon.  Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.

flavor_text_entries.flavor_text:
Steals HP from a
sleeping victim.

Steals HP from a
sleeping victim.

Takes one half the damage
inflicted on a sleeping foe.

Takes one half the damage
inflicted on a sleeping foe.

Absorbs half the
damage it inflicted
on a sleeping foe
to restore HP.

An attack that works
only on a sleeping
foe. It absorbs half
the damage caused to
heal the user’s HP.

An attack that works
only on a sleeping
foe. It absorbs half
the damage caused to
heal the user’s HP.

An attack that works
only on a sleeping
foe. It absorbs half
the damage caused to
heal the user’s HP.

Le lanceur mange le rêve de l’ennemi
endormi. Le lanceur récupère en PV
la moitié des dégâts infligés.

The user eats the dreams of a sleeping
target. It absorbs half the damage
caused to heal the user’s HP.

The user eats the dreams of a sleeping
target. It absorbs half the damage
caused to heal the user’s HP.

ねている　あいての　ゆめを　たべて
こうげきする。　ダメージの　はんぶんの
ＨＰを　かいふく　する。

잠자고 있는 상대의 꿈을 먹어
공격한다. 데미지의 절반을
HP로 회복한다.

Le lanceur mange le rêve de l’ennemi endormi.
Il récupère en PV la moitié des dégâts infligés.

Attacke gegen schlafendes Ziel.
Die Hälfte des zugefügten Schadens
wird dem Anwender gutgeschrieben.

Restaura al usuario la mitad del daño causado a un
objetivo dormido.

Attacco che funziona solo su un bersaglio
che dorme. Chi lo usa riceve metà dei PS
persi dal Pokémon colpito.

The user eats the dreams of a sleeping
target. It absorbs half the damage
caused to heal its own HP.

寝ている　相手の　夢を　食べて
攻撃する。ダメージの　半分の
ＨＰを　回復する。

ねている　あいての　ゆめを　たべて
こうげきする。　ダメージの　はんぶんの
ＨＰを　かいふく　する。
